conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: extruded walls with thickness, angled/isometric camera, visible interior volume, and roof/ceiling removed to show rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have clear height/thickness and readable corners; floor plane is distinct; elevated angled view shows multiple wall faces; cutaway is clean with only minor simplifications.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall 3BHK layout matches (central living/dining, left and right bedrooms, balconies, kitchen/utility). Some proportional/placement simplifications and openings (especially windows) are not fully verifiable or appear reduced compared to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present: beds in bedrooms, seating and dining in living/dining, kitchen counters, and bathroom fixtures. Minor simplification of some elements.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is readable with adequate lighting and materials. Text labels are overlaid on the 3D model, reducing presentation cleanliness; some fine details (windows/door swings) are less clear.

detected_errors.description: Doors appear mostly present, but window/opening placement and sizing are not consistently clear or fully matching the 2D plan.
Text labels are present on the 3D render surfaces, reducing presentation/background cleanliness.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with minor discrepancies/ambiguity in openings (especially windows) and some UI/text contamination.
